archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1036
archimate:Requirement.documentation: We need to be able to offer special Vodafone staff pricing/discounts

properties.value: Special pricing/discounts for VF employees available for transition and also for new plans. To be discussed during hierarchy session how to mark the VF staff in the system. Market Segment/s? Special onboarding process?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
